ISSUE.TITLE: [feature request] ignore file configuration like .gitignore
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: This is a feature request to have a ignore file for a project. **Expected use case:** When developing a workflow with Python, Python generates `__pycache__` files. In Python development, it is a popular way to create a virtual environment under the project directory and sometimes it could be pushed to digdag server or could fail to push due to the large size of library dirs. It is a usual way to develop workflow locally and push to server for production. So I'd be happy if we could have a ignore file configuration.
